Text:
Let us pray.
Stay close to us, Lord, through the darkness of this night. [t] Let each hour pass in peace. Give us restful sleep and an early morning. [*] Help us rise tomorrow, ready and able to rejoice in the resurrection of your Christ, who lives and reigns forever.
Amen.
Changes: 2024-01-19 - Paul Prins: Reworked to be more stylistically in line with my writing.
2023-12-09 - Paul Prins: Updated after the midpoint to fix a grammar issue.
2023-08-30 - Paul Prins: Retranslated this prayer to fit with other compline concluding prayers
